params._amount: The amount of tokens to check.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.

returns._0: True if the user is eligible to claim, false otherwise.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to claim.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.

params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root of the airdrop.
params._timeForClaim: The time until which claims are allowed.

initialize(bytes).details: This function should be called by the DeployManager after deploying the contract.

params._initData: The initialization data for the utility contract.

returns._0: True if the initialization was successful.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

airdropChecker(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Checks if the user is eligible to claim tokens based on a Merkle proof.

claim(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Allows a user to claim tokens based on a Merkle proof.

constructor.notice: Initializes Ownable with the deployer (which will be superseded by _owner during initialization).

deposit(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to deposit tokens into the contract.

getInitData(address,address,bytes32,uint.notice: Returns the ABI-encoded initialization data for the contract.

initialize(bytes).notice: Initializes the utility contract with the provided data.

merkleRoot().notice: The Merkle root of the airdrop.

recoverUnclaimed().notice: Allows the owner to recover unclaimed tokens after the claim period has expired.

timeForClaim().notice: The time until which claims are allowed.

token().notice: The ERC20 token that is being claimed.

totalTokensClaimed().notice: The total amount of tokens claimed by users.
